experience.title: Board Member | Advisory - Alternative Investments
experience.description: Advisory to the investment committee and CIO in identifying innovative alternative investment strategies, including private equity, hedge funds, and real assets. Responsibilities include evaluating fund performance, conducting due diligence on emerging portfolio managers, and guiding strategic asset allocation. The family office represents a distinguished UHNW Monaco-based family with interests spanning luxury real estate, global finance, and philanthropy.

experience.title: Alternative Invesment Advisory
experience.description: Offshore Capitalist provides bespoke investment and offshore advisory services for high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs) and entrepreneurs, specializing in private banking, international real estate, digital assets, and emerging markets. Key offerings include structured investments, actively managed portfolios, and strategies for wealth optimization, global mobility, and financial sovereignty.As an alternative investment advisor, the role focuses on fund selection, portfolio analysis, and performance assessment, ensuring optimal asset allocation and risk management. Responsibilities extend to supporting investor relations and delivering insights to align with the firm's commitment to globally diversified, high-value investment opportunities.www.theoffshorecapitalists.com

experience.title: Special Advisor to Board & Partner
experience.description: As an Advisor to the CEO at Chiron Partners LLP my responsibilities include developing and executing fundraising strategies, managing investor relationships, and overseeing fund structuring and deal flow management.Key Responsibilities:Fundraising Strategy: Lead the development and execution of fundraising strategies.Investor Relations: Cultivate and maintain relationships with existing and prospective investors, providing transparent communication and engagement opportunities to foster trust and confidence.Fund Structuring: Oversee the structuring and launch of investment vehicles, developing fund strategies and risk management frameworks to optimize returns for investors.Deal Flow Management: Source and evaluate investment opportunities, conduct due diligence, and negotiate terms with prospective portfolio companies to drive investment decisions.Fund Administration: Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and reporting standards, collaborating with legal and compliance teams to address investor inquiries and facilitate fund-related processes.Continuous Improvement: Drive initiatives to enhance fundraising processes and practices, identifying opportunities to improve efficiency and investor engagement.
experience.description_html: As an Advisor to the CEO at Chiron Partners LLP my responsibilities include developing and executing fundraising strategies, managing investor relationships, and overseeing fund structuring and deal flow management.Key Responsibilities:Fundraising Strategy: Lead the development and execution of fundraising strategies.Investor Relations: Cultivate and maintain relationships with existing and prospective investors, providing transparent communication and engagement opportunities to foster trust and confidence.Fund Structuring: Oversee the structuring and launch of investment vehicles, developing fund strategies and risk management frameworks to optimize returns for investors.Deal Flow Management: Source and evaluate investment opportunities, conduct due diligence, and negotiate terms with prospective portfolio companies to drive investment decisions.Fund Administration: Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and reporting standards, collaborating with legal and compliance teams to address investor inquiries and facilitate fund-related processes.Continuous Improvement: Drive initiatives to enhance fundraising processes and practices, identifying opportunities to improve efficiency and investor engagement.

experience.title: Head of Fundraising - Single Family Office
experience.description: Chaired by Her Excellency Shaikha Moaza Obaid Suhail Al Maktoum, Pride group is a nonbanking, private network of multinational companies based in Dubai, UAE. Established in 1986, Pride operates decentralizedly with a corporate community of 10,000+ employees and over 3,000 independent representatives globally. Covering various sectors from information systems to healthcare, Pride has affiliates in 43+ countries across 5 continents. Managing assets worth over $2 billion, including real estate in Asia, Europe, and North America.

experience.title: Advisory - Sales
experience.description: Driving growth for B2B financial services firms through AI-powered lead generation and sales strategies. Specializing in Fintechs,fund management, trust advisory, hedge funds, and wealth advisory, Delivering high-quality leads and close sales pipelines with precision.AI-Enhanced Lead Generation: Leveraging advanced AI tools to identify and target top-tier clients.Sales Pipeline Mastery: Expertly managing the sales process from initial contact to deal closure.Closing Expertise: Employing proven techniques to close deals efficiently and effectively, ensuring high conversion rates.Client Education: Simplifying complex financial products and services for informed client decisions.Industry Expertise: Deep understanding of B2B financial services, catering to niche markets.AchievementsBoosted lead quality by 30% and sales conversions by 25% in the first year.Educated over 500 clients on advanced financial strategies, enhancing satisfaction and retention.Implemented AI-driven systems reducing lead acquisition costs by 20%.

experience.title: Investment Research Associate
experience.description: FVTURA Investments serves a broad range of investors, including high-net-worth individuals (HNWI), institutional investors, and family offices. They specialize in sustainable and impact investing, focusing on companies that align with environmental, social, and governance (ESG) principles. FVTURA offers tailored investment strategies that generate long-term growth and positive societal impact, meeting the unique objectives and values of family offices and their stakeholders.

experience.title: Investor Relations & Fundraiser Head
experience.description: Spearheading fundraising and investor outreach initiatives, with a strong emphasis on global macro trends and emerging markets. We work closely with startups and project developers, crafting comprehensive fundraising strategies that secure financial support across various stages, from Pre-Seed to Series B. I leverage data-driven financial analysis and forecasting skills to create persuasive investment materials and assess market opportunities on a global scale, aiding our clients in attracting potential investors.Evaluating risk metrics, and offering valuable insights to minimize dilution and maximize shareholder return on equity. Furthermore, we establish strategic partnerships, positioning our firm as a sought-after investment partner and value creator, particularly in the dynamic realm of emerging market venture capital and private equity."
